title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps          Below is a list of downloadable maps in pdf (Adobe Portable Document Format). To view these maps, you will need Acrobat Reader or the Acrobat plug-in for your browser. Note that some map files are large and may take some time to download.                    Click here to download a road map of the Lassen Volcanic National Park area 164kb PDF File          Map of Lassen Volcanic National Park   Click here to download a map of Lassen Volcanic National Park  (pdf, 2.6MB)           Click here to download a map showing Lassen Volcanic National Park and the surrounding area. 72kb PDF File           Click here to download a map showing the different types of volcanoes in the park. 308kb PDF File         Click here to download a map showing slope characteristic for the southwest and Lassen Peak areas of Lassen Volcanic National Park (Attention: This map does not show current conditions at Lassen Volcanic National Park. This map only shows potential avalanche terrain. Please be sure you are knowledgeable about avalanche danger and are properly equipped for winter backcountry travel.)
